    • Uses of IUpdateStrategy in model.strategy

      Classes in model.strategy that implement IUpdateStrategy 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  AlignedStrategy
      Detects if two balls' velocities are roughly aligned.
      class  AUpdateStrategy<TMsg>
      Very simple abstract class that provides invariant behavior to some IUpdateStrategies.
      class  Collide2Strategy<TMsg>
      Elastic collision implemented purely as an interaction strategy.
      class  CollideExactStrategy
      A physically correct elastic two-body collision model.
      class  CollideStrategy
      Collide Strategy Class.
      class  DelayedOverlapStrategy
      Detects if the ball overlaps with any other balls on a delayed timer cycle.
      class  EatStrategy<TMsg>
      Kills whomever the ball collides with and increases its area by the killed ball's area.
      class  FlashStrategy<TMsg>
      Strategy that only installs an interaction strategy and thus at least needs to be combined with a strategy that detects an interaction, e.g.
      class  GravityStrategy
      This strategy causes a ball to fall to the bottom and bounce.
      class  GrowStrategy<TMsg>
      An update strategy that increases the radius to a certain point.
      class  KillStrategy<TMsg>
      Deletes other when it collides.
      class  MultiStrategy<TMsg>
      An update strategy that combines two update strategies.
      class  OverlapStrategy
      Detects if the ball overlaps with any other balls.
      class  ShrinkStrategy<TMsg>
      An update strategy that shrinks the radius to a certain size.
      class  SimilarColorStrategy
      Detects if the ball has a similar color to that of any other ball.
      class  SpawnStrategy
      Strategy that both collides and interacts.
      class  StraightStrategy<TMsg>
      An update strategy that does nothing.
      class  SwapColorStrategy<TMsg>
      Swaps colors with whatever ball it interacts with.
      class  SwitcherStrategy<TMsg>
      This class is a wrapper over a single arbitrary strategy which can be changed.
      class  TakeColorStrategy<TMsg>
      Takes the color of other ball.
      class  TeleportingStrategy
      An update strategy that jumps to a random location.
      class  ZoneStrategy
      An update strategy that sets the color based on which quadrant the location is.
